ygData.subject: Alchemy tips
ygData.msgSnippet: The old system of alchemy is in the process of being overhauled. A year ago, I did the kitty shaman alchemy quests just short of the epic. I lost interest and
ygData.messageBody:
The old system of alchemy is in the process of being overhauled. A
year ago, I did the kitty shaman alchemy quests just short of the
epic. I lost interest and decided that it was more fun to just lvl by
hunting.

Now I have a lvl 43 shaman with 21 points in alchemy. The trainers
won't increase my points above that until I actually atart using the
skill. G.

The old formulas have changed. Has anyone worked out the best way to
bring the alchemy points up yet with the new formulas? I'm doing
homework on this too. It's still in progress. I'll share what I find.
Has someone else already invented the wheel? G.

Edward Fox
